The Campion Dynasty ruled over the city-state of Westgate from the , until the . 
 King Altarl 
 Reigned  – . An influential merchant who was selected by his peers to rule. First King of the Campion Dynasty. 
 King Jhentyr I 
 Reigned  – . Firstborn son of Altarl. 
 King Tarnhart I 
 Reigned  – . Nephew of King Jentyr I. 
 King Jhentyr II 
 Reigned  – . Second son of Tarnhart I. 
 King Tarnhart II 
 Reigned  – . Firstborn son of Jhentyr II.
